divs: Sighting Details1. I was with my partner getting the mail from the mail box in my subdivision. 2. The sparkling nature of the star like objects moving randomly in the sky in and out of formation. 3. We thought it was a formation of UFO's moving in a random formation across the sky, because they were moving so quickly. They were going faster than any airplanes could move. 4. There were 6 to 7 star like objects moving in a random formation in the sky. They were sparkling and moving very quickly!! 5. Our actions were of amazement and wonder. We were wondering what the objects were and tried to get the i-phone out to record. They moved out of sight too quickly to record. After the event occurred we were questioning what we saw. 6. The sparkling objects moved very quickly across the sky and into clouds and disappeared. I did not even have time to pull my i-phone out to try and record the lights. They were very fast!
Summary: Looked up in the sky and saw sparkling star like objects moving in random formation
trends: There have been 148 other sightings in San Antonio
There were no other sightings in San Antonio on or around May 2nd 2013
